flawed_nl_solution:
Before dinner, she had 56+8=<<56+8=64>>64 ounces of CM.
Before drinking 8 ounces of CM during lunch, she had 64+8=<<64+8=72>>72 ounces of CM.
Before buying 64 ounces of CM, she had 72-64=<<72-64=13>>13 ounces of CM.
And before breakfast, she had 13+8=<<13+8=21>>21 ounces of chocolate milk.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
